arts.ttl: Saudi Arabia club Al-Hilal says contract with Neymar has been terminated by mutual consent
arts.sum: The 32-year-old barely played for the Saudi club after he joined from Paris Saint-Germain in August 2023 for 90 million euros ($94 million). Saudi Arabia club Al-Hilal said Monday it reached an agreement with Brazilian striker Neymar to terminate their contract by mutual consent.

arts.ttl: Neymar’s contract with Al-Hilal terminated by mutual consent
arts.sum: The 32-year-old Brazil international is closing in on a move to former club Santos.

arts.ttl: Al Hilal, Neymar reach agreement to end contract
arts.sum: Saudi Pro League club Al Hilal announced on Monday that they had reached an agreement with Neymar to terminate his contract and open the door for a return to Santos for the Brazil international.

arts.ttl: Injury-hit Neymar has Al-Hilal contract terminated
arts.sum: Neymar has his contracted at Saudi Pro League side Al-Hilal terminated by mutual consent, amid a reported move back to Santos.

arts.ttl: Oficial: 'Bomba' confirmada. Al Hilal anuncia saída de Neymar
arts.sum: Internacional brasileiro pode estar de regresso ao Santos.

arts.ttl: Neymar could be about to cause Liverpool and Arne Slot a big issue ahead of the summer - opinion
arts.sum: In a surprise turn of events, it could actually be Brazilian superstar Neymar who causes Liverpool to lose one of their key players in the...

arts.ttl: Verbal agreement in place to bring an end to Neymar’s time in Saudi Arabia
arts.sum: Neymar appears set for a return to the club that forged him as a young player with a verbal agreement in place between Al Hilal and Santos. At present the nature of the return to the Brazilian top flight has yet to be established with the current plan to be a six-month loan with Santos looking for a longer term given that the new Brazilian season starts at the end of March and runs through to December 29.

arts.ttl: Neymar, Garnacho and five transfers that could be completed this week
arts.sum: Chelsea’s pursuit of Alejandro Garnacho is expected to be one of the key talking points during the final week of the January window and a deal could be agreed soon. Arsenal defender Oleksandr Zinchenko could leave the club before the January transfer window ends, and Borussia Dortmund are pushing to sign him.

arts.ttl: Liverpool could suffer Mohamed Salah blow as 'verbal agreement' reached for 32-year-old
arts.sum: Al-Hilal and Brazil winger Neymar reportedly reaches a verbal agreement to return to boyhood club Santos, and the deal should be finalised this week.

arts.ttl: Neymar’s next club CONFIRMED as Barcelona offer revealed
arts.sum: According to journalist Victor Navarro, Barcelona were given the opportunity to sign their former player in what would have been a spectacular and unexpected return to Camp Nou given the animosity that surrounded his world-record €222 million departure to PSG in 2017. Neymar ’s future has been decided, with the Brazil great set to leave Al-Hilal on loan during the January transfer window in a surprising twist for the former Barcelona and PSG attacker.
